data.name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: Stormsire's Cursebreakers
data.detailed_description:
LEARN TO PLAY


About the Game

Battle-mages with mastery over howling storm magic who have been sent to investigate the curse of Shadespire. Stormsire's Cursebreakers are a small, elite warband. All three are wizards, letting them make use of special spell cards. Unlock this warband and play as Stormsire's Cursebreakers in Warhammer Underworlds: Online now.

FIGHTERS

  • Stormsire and his two companions inspire when they successfully cast a spell. Prepare your decks!
  • Averon Stormsire is able to attack from a range - use this to your advantage and keep your distance!
  • Ammis Dawnguard and Rastus the Charmed have the ability to empower their attacks!

TIPS AND TRICKS

  • Thanks to their excellent offensive abilities, spellcasting, range, and great durability, you may employ both offensive and defensive strategies while playing Stormsire’s Cursebreakers!
  • With every member of your warband being a wizard, you’ll want to make sure to take as many spell gambits as possible to inspire them and take out the enemy!
  • Like their brethren in the Farstriders and Steelheart’s Champions, Stormsire’s Cursebreakers have a range of powerful upgrades available, allowing you to turn your chosen fighter into an unstoppable juggernaut – if you’ve got the Glory.

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 @ 2.80 GHz / AMD FX-4350 @ 4.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
